name: Re:Discover a Life: Halloween
description:
Re:Discover a Life is a visual novel about Kota, a stock up university student, whom gave up all the joys of young person's life to get into the college of his choice. It still took him 4 years to get excepted, and now he has to learn how to enjoy life all over again.  Follow a story of Kota and his new friends, help him relax and eventually live a normal college life.

This is a Halloween event game, of a Re:Discover a Life visual novel. The game is taking place between 1st and 2nd chapter of the game, but does not necessarily require you to play the main game. At the start of a game you will have a choice to either read the summarized story of a 1st chapter, or put in the main game code, that will transfer your main game stats into this one. You will also receive a code for the main game after you finish this one. If you don't type in the main games code at the begining, you will automatically start with the optimal stats for this event game version.

This game was made for 2022 Spooktober, a visual novel game jam.

The main game is not yet released so please make a save file before getting the code.
